text: Behind the Curtain: Trump's big, unfixable, glaring glitch … - He's haunted. … - He falls for fake news. … - He's old. … - His bubble lies to him.

Monica Lewinsky applauds Drudge Report for labeling debate ‘The End’ for Trump  —  Activist and author Monica Lewinsky offered a rare praise for the Drudge Report for describing this week's presidential debate between former President Trump and Vice President Harris as “The End” for the Trump campaign.

Tapper: Why Won't Kamala Answer Questions?  —  Perhaps the headlong rush into the media's post-debate Enforced Joy narrative has hit a speedbump.  —  Yesterday, focus groups started telling Reuters, CNN, and the New York Times that Kamala Harris didn't impress them as a serious candidate, even if she managed to out-jab Donald Trump.
